title: Shellephant

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Shellephant strikes the ground beneath a target with its fists to distract them, if they perform an action tonight, they will be roleblocked through immunities the next one, they learn this at night. (Day action)
- Guard a player, any attacks they recieve will be silently redirected to you, if they are lynched the next day, you will be lynched instead.
- Shellephant's Ultimate ability, it will blow fire from its trunk to light 2 targets ablaze, when they are killed, they will be roleblocked and cleaned. (2 uses, shared by non-killing mutants)

desc:
Post 3537
*Crab-elephant hybrid mutant, Their forearms, back, and face are covered in spikes, they stand on their hind legs when not walking.*
